articles.author: John Fritze
articles.title: Supreme Court signals it will make it easier for Americans to file ‘reverse discrimination’ suits - CNN
articles.description: The Supreme Court appeared virtually certain to side with an Ohio woman who lost a “reverse discrimination” suit against her employer when her gay boss declined to promote her, a decision that will likely make it easier for some White and straight employees t…
